p: The incense smoke of agarwood was prepared using HS preheated system. Agarwood powder (50 mg) was weighted and placed in a 20 mL glass vial. The vial was sealed with Teflon, shaken, and incubated at 150 Â°C for 30 min in a headspace autosampler oven (Model HS-20, Shimadzu Corporation, Kyoto, Japan).
